name: Special Chow
description: Kan Chow siam zingah chuan a tui ber a ni a, Chow pangngai a kan telh thin zawng zawng chawhpawlh bakah a tih tui nan thil dang chi hrang hrang pawh tel a ni a. Soup pawh a chhawm tel bawk.

name: Special Rice
description: Kan Fried Rice siam zingah chuan a tui ber a ni a, Fried Rice pangngai a kan telh thin zawng zawng chawhpawlh bakah a tih tui nan thil dang chi hrang hrang pawh tel a ni a. Soup pawh a chhawm tel bawk.

name: Vegetable Chow
description: Chow kan tih hi Chowmein a ni a. Chow pangngaiah hian Thai rah/hnah remchang apiang telh thin a ni a - a remchan dan ang zelin carrot, bean, sweet corn, green peas te hi telh a ni tlangpui. Heng bakah hian a remchan chuan thlai dang tel thin a ni bawk.

name: Chicken Chow
description: Chow kan tih hi Chowmein a ni a. Chow pangngaiah hian Thai rah/hnah remchang apiang telh thin a ni a - a remchan dan ang zelin carrot, bean, sweet corn, green peas te hi telh a ni tlangpui. Heng bakah hian arsa telh a ni. Soup a chhawm bawk e

name: Beef Chow
description: Chow kan tih hi Chowmein a ni a. Chow pangngaiah hian Thai rah/hnah remchang apiang telh thin a ni a - a remchan dan ang zelin carrot, bean, sweet corn, green peas te hi telh a ni tlangpui. Heng bakah hian bawng sa telh a ni. Soup a chhawm bawk e.

name: Chow Var Satui Leih
description: Chow kan tih hi Chowmein a ni a. Chow ah hian Satui a hranpa telh a ni a. Satui leih bakah hian Soup a chhawm tel tho bawk.

name: Egg-topped Chow
description: Chow kan tih hi Chowmein a ni a. Chow pangngaiah hian Thai rah/hnah remchang apiang telh thin a ni a - a remchan dan ang zelin carrot, bean, sweet corn, green peas te hi telh a ni tlangpui. Hemi chungah hian artui kan dah tel a ni a, artui kan hi a hmin leh hmin lo in a siam theih a, sawi a nih hran loh chuan a hmin lo in siam a ni. Soup a chhawm tel bawk.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
description: Fried Rice ah hian a remchan dan ang zelin carrot, bean, sweet corn, green peas te telh thin a ni a. Heng bakah hian Thlai dang a awm remchan chuan telh a ni bawk. Soup a chhawm bawk.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: Fried Rice ah hian a remchan dan ang zelin carrot, bean, sweet corn, green peas te telh thin a ni a. Heng bakah hian arsa kan telh a ni. Soup a chhawm bawk.

name: Beef Fried Rice
description: Fried Rice ah hian a remchan dan ang zelin carrot, bean, sweet corn, green peas te telh thin a ni a. Heng bakah hian bawngsa kan telh a ni. Soup a chhawm bawk.

name: Egg-topped Fried Rice
description: Fried Rice ah hian a remchan dan ang zelin carrot, bean, sweet corn, green peas te telh thin a ni a. Hemi chungah hian artui kan dah tel a ni a, artui kan hi a hmin leh hmin lo in a siam theih a, sawi a nih hran loh chuan a hmin lo in siam a ni. Soup a chhawm bawk.

name: Vegetable Chowmein
description: Chowmein hi Soupy Chowmein kan tih thin kha ni a. Chow(Chowmein) pangngai ang tho a ni a, tuiril zawk a siam a ni thung. Thlai rah leh hnah remchan ang zelin pawlh a ni.

name: Chicken Chowmein
description: Chowmein hi Soupy Chowmein kan tih thin kha ni a. Chow(Chowmein) pangngai ang tho a ni a, tuiril zawk a siam a ni thung. Thlai rah leh hnah remchang ang leh arsa pawlh tel a ni.

name: Beef Chowmein
description: Chowmein hi Soupy Chowmein kan tih thin kha ni a. Chow(Chowmein) pangngai ang tho a ni a, tuiril zawk a siam a ni thung. Thlai rah leh hnah remchang ang leh bawngsa pawlh tel a ni.

name: Mixed Chowmein
description: Chowmein hi Soupy Chowmein kan tih thin kha ni a. Chow(Chowmein) pangngai ang tho a ni a, tuiril zawk a siam a ni thung. Thlai rah leh hnah remchang ang leh sa chi hrang leh artui kan nen pawlh tel a ni.

name: Steamed Momo
description: Momo hi Dumpling chi khat a ni a. A chhungah hian arsa dah a ni

name: Fried Momo
description: Momo hi Dumpling chi khat a ni a. A chhungah hian arsa dah a ni. Hei hi tel sa takah thlak a kan a ni.

name: Chilli Momo
description: Momo hi Dumpling chi khat a ni a. A chhungah hian arsa dah a ni. Hei hi Hmarcha nen tuihnai tak a bawl a ni.

name: Egg Roll
description: Atta/Maida kan leh artui kan Roll a ni a, a chhungah hian bawlhlo chi hrang hrang telh a ni.

name: Chicken Roll
description: Atta/Maida kan leh Arsa Roll a ni a, a chhungah hian bawlhlo chi hrang hrang telh a ni.

name: Beef Roll
description: Atta/Maida kan leh Bawngsa Roll a ni a, a chhungah hian bawlhlo chi hrang hrang telh a ni.

name: Egg Chicken Roll
description: Atta/Maida kan, artui kan leh Arsa Roll a ni a, a chhungah hian bawlhlo chi hrang hrang telh a ni.

name: Egg Beef Roll
description: Atta/Maida kan, artui kan leh Bawngsa Roll a ni a, a chhungah hian bawlhlo chi hrang hrang telh a ni.

name: Mixed Roll
description: Atta/Maida kan, Sa chi hrang hrang leh artui kan Roll a ni a, a chhungah hian bawlhlo chi hrang hrang telh a ni.

name: Lassi
description: Bawnghnute atanga siam khawlum lai a in chi vawt tui tak a ni.

name: Cold Coffee
description: Coffee vawt dai raih mai a siam, vur nen a pawlh, tuihnai tak a ni.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: Bawnghnute, Strawberry leh vur khang chawhpawlh.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: Bawnghnute, Chocolate leh vur khang chawhpawlh.

name: Vanilla Milkshake
description: Bawnghnute, Vanilla leh vur khang chawhpawlh

name: Alu Bawngsa
description: Alu leh Bawngsa siam pawlh, Mizo duh dan tak a siam a ni.

name: Sachek
description: Sachek tuihnai leh thianghlim tak a sawngbawl a ni a. Thianghlim tak a sawngbawl a nih avangin a kha ve fuk lo a, rim dang a nam lo bawk.

name: Bawng Soup
description: Bawngsa ti tha lai leh ruh atanga siam, bawngsa chhum han leh tui hang tui em em mai.

name: Chilli Chicken
description: Arsa kan leh Hmarcha tui tak a bawl a a ni

name: Chicken Dry Fry
description: Arsa kan ro tui tak a bawl a ni.

name: Sawhchiar
description: Mizo arsa sawhchiar dik tak hmui tui em em a siam a ni

name: Sanpiau
description: Burma sawhchiar a ni a, papawr leh sa leh thil dang dang telh a ni.

name: Mix
description: Sawhchiar leh Chow mix a ni tlangpui a, palte a suah chi thil dang nen pawh a mix theih tho bawk.

name: Alu Paratha
description: Alu leh Maida chawhpawlh, tui tak a kan a ni a, bawlhlo dang te pawh telh a ni.

name: Omlette
description: Artui kan a bik tak a siam.

name: Chana
description: Motor chana hlang hmanga siam a ni.

name: Artui chhum
description: Artui chhum hmin.

name: Paratha
description: Puri ti a sawi a ni bawk. Maida nuai sa, tel sa a thlak (deep fry) a ni.

name: Chhangban
description: Mizo chhang ti a sawi a ni bawk. Buh/buhban atanga siam sa, kan (deep fry) a ni.

name: Alu chop
description: Alu chhum rawt sawm artui a plaster.

name: Pakora
description: Besan pakora a ni a, Pakora dang te aiin a lian in ei a manhla em em a ni.

name: Chhangpuar
description: Chhangthawp kan puar a ni a, a thlum ve tuk lo va, ama thlumna neih sa (natural sweetness) ang thei tur ber a siam a ni

name: Thingpui
description: Thingpui paw thlum; Kan dawr hi Tea Stall a nih ang ngeiin - uluk taka a rim, a rawng leh tuina ngai pawimawh tak a siam a ni.

name: Mineral Water
description: Tui - bur khat (400 - 500 ml).
